1.content:
David has just gotten home from school he threw his backpack on the couch and his keys in the key tray. Today just wasn’t his day David failed on his science test which dropped his grade from a C to a D and report cards were being mailed out today. David was about to head upstairs to his room when “David” he heard come from the kitchen. “Damn did report cards come in already” he said. He walked into the kitchen and saw his mom making dinner she was wearing her work clothes already. “Hey David I’m about to head out in an hour just finishing up dinner real quick” she lifted up the spoon from the pot and took a sip “mmm that’s good oh and before I forget you got a package in the mail today it doesn’t have an outgoing address but it came in your name” she said. David didn’t remember ordering anything let alone that the sender was unknown. “Where did you put the package at” he asked, “in your room” his mom replied. David walked out of the kitchen and headed upstairs to his room and saw a small box on his bed he picked it up and to his surprise it was his name and address but no sender “odd” he thought. He shook it next to his ear just sounded like it was a one small item in it opening it up there was just a clicker and a folded piece of paper. The paper read “David we know who you are we have been watching you we trust you to test this device for us the clicker in the box is used to take control of the body you point it at use it wisely”. This had to be a prank there’s no way this is real, just then David heard an a car alarm outside he looked out the window and saw his sister and her friend she probably got out of school he thought. Her friend’s name was Wendy she was a blond blue eyed babe but also a b**** at the same time( https://www.gettyimages.com/detail/photo... ) she could be a good target as well to test if this was real, or I could try it on Rosa see what’s it like to be my sister, there was also mom she was still home haven’t left yet, then there’s dad I wouldn’t mind being the man of the house.

You decide to....
1.title: The Strange Package

11.content: Wendy and Rosa has just gotten home from school and we’re heading inside the house. David was was really wondering if this device was really gonna work he pointed the device through the window at Wendy “here goes nothing”. David pushes the button, Wendy staggered and dropped her phone “hey Wendy you okay” Rosa said. David moved his long blond hair out of his face and saw Wendy’s face through the cars window reflection. “Holy s*** it actually worked I’m Wendy” David said. Rosa grabbed your shoulder “hey you good” David didn’t know how to reply he just shook his head yes. Rosa started walking into the house David followed only trip in the high heels Wendy was wearing “fuck how does she walk in these” he said. He picked himself up but kept losing his balance walking in the house. Right when he stepped inside he kicked off the shoes. Rosa looked surprised “I though you don’t like to be barefooted”. Sitting down he started rubbing his feet “yeah I don’t but those heels were just killing me you know what I mean right”. Rosa just looked confused “well I’m gonna start my homework your acting kind of weird but when your done and wash your hands to”. Now that you were on your own this was your chance to explore this body he said.
11.title: Wendy it is

113.content: David couldn’t believe that he was actually in Wendy’s body. He had so many thoughts going in his head on how he could embarrass Wendy for being the bitch she was but that was for another time. Right now he just wanted to try the clicker again. He reached into his pocket and the clicker was right there. He thought about his next target and that was?
113.title: Try the clicker again

info.brief_description: When David Grey receives a package from and unknown sender his life takes a new turn
info.description:
David receives a strange package while he’s at home one day but the sender is unknown. He receives a clicker that when pointed at someone you press the button on the remote and you are instantly that person but while your in that body your body stays lifeless from where you were at

Rules:
1. The clicker only has 2 buttons (one to possess and one to return to body)
2. No killing the main character unless it’s a good reason
3. Sex is okay
4. If David loses the clicker or anyone lose it they will be return to there original body (that includes changing ownership of the clicker)
4. Have fun and keep the story going

Characters:
David Gray- main character, 16yrs old, dark brown hair, blue eyes average body type, 5,5 Junior in high school, best friend is Anthony

Mathew Gray- David’s Father, 41yrs old, dark brown hair with some gray, brown eyes, buff likes to keep himself in shape, 5,7 Works in construction

Arlene Gray- David’s Mother, 36 yrs old, light brown hair, slim, CC breast, blue eyes, 5,6 works at a makeup store in the mall
https://www.pinterest.com/pin/266556871677985859/?amp_client_id=Uytg4hXbX1ItosJM...

Rosa Gray- David’s Sister, 22 yrs old, hourglass figure, brown hair, CC breast, brown eyes, 5,4 in college
https://qph.fs.quoracdn.net/main-qimg-9d617bb6bd20599ac5179660b982a26a-c

Anthony Garcia- David’s best friend, 17 yrs old, build body type, black combover haircut, brown eyes, Junior in high school

Add more characters as you go on enjoy!!!
